text: "From Me to You" is a song by The Beatles, written by John Lennon and Paul McCartney. Released in 1963 as a single, it was their first big hit, staying on top of the chart for seven straight weeks. "From Me to You" comprises five verses and two bridges. It lasts less than two minutes. Category:The Beatles songs Category:1963 songs Category:The Crickets songs Category:Del Shannon songs
title: From Me to You
